yo: Ọkọ̀ òfurufu ààrẹ balẹ̀ sí pápá òfurufú ààrẹ tẹ́lẹ̀ tẹ́lẹ̀ rí tó wà nílùú Àbújá.
en: The presidential plane landed at the former presidential airport in Abuja.

yo: Onírúurú ìlù là á bá pàdé lóde àríyá.
en: We will meet a variety of drummers outside the party.

yo: Ìpàdé àpérò yìí ló tún jẹ́ àkọ́kọ́ irú u rẹ̀ nílẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀.
en: This conference meeting is also the first of its kind in Adulalaw.

yo: Kékeré àdúrà kan ò sí, ta ló mọ èyi tó máa gbà?
en: There is no prayer, who knows what he will receive?

yo: Kí ni ìwọ ń fi ojoojúmọ́ ṣépè sí ná?
en: What do you say everyday?

yo: Ẹ jáwọ́ lórí ẹ̀sun Ṣòwòrẹ́: Adébáyọ̀ ló sọ éyí.
en: Stop accusing Shorore: Adébayo said this.

yo: Ṣé ìwọ ò mọ̀ wípé àǹjọ̀ọ̀nú burúkú ní ń bépé rìn ni?
en: Don't you know that bad things are going on?

yo: Ilé-ẹjọ́ ní Bùkọ́lá le di alága àjọ tó ń mójútó oúnjẹ àti oògùn.
en: The court in Bukola can become the chairman of the organization that manages food and drugs.

yo: Fálànà, gbọ́ tìrẹ: tara ẹni là á gbọ́.
en: Falana, listen to yourself: it's up to you to listen.

yo: Ìmọ́tótó borí ààrùn mọ́lẹ̀ bí ọyẹ́ ti ń borí ooru.
en: Cleanliness overcomes disease like a feather overcomes heat.

yo: Ẹjọ́ yìí kò ní ẹ̀rí láti gbe ẹ̀sùn rẹ̀ lẹ́sẹ̀ nítorí náà, ilé-ẹjọ́ da ẹjọ́ náà nú.
en: This case did not have evidence to support his case, so the court dismissed the case.

yo: Ẹni tí ò bá ní káàdì ìdìbò kó lọ ṣe ìforúkọsílẹ̀ torí láì sí èyí kò sí ìdìbò.
en: Anyone who does not have a voting card should go and register because without this there is no voting.

yo: Ìforúkọsílẹ̀ ń lọ lọ́wọ́ lọ́wọ́ fún ìdánwò sí ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ gíga.
en: Registration is ongoing for the university entrance examination.

yo: Láìsí káàdì ìdánimọ̀, kò sí àǹfààní láti jókòó fún ìdánwò ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ gíga.
en: Without an identity card, there is no chance to sit for the university exam.

yo: Àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ lọ ṣe àyẹ̀wò lóri bí àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ ó ṣe máa lo káádì ìdánimọ̀ ọ wọn.
en: The staff went to check on how the students will use their identity card.

yo: Àjọ tó ń mójú tó ìdánwò sí ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ gíga ti fèsì sí ìbéèrè tó wà lóde.
en: The organization that administers the examination to higher education has responded to the question that is out there.

yo: Àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ yóò wo àṣéyọrí àti ìpèníjà àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́.
en: Staff will look at students' successes and challenges.

yo: Lẹ́yìn gbogbo idúnkokò Akíntọ́lá kọ̀wé àti fi iṣẹ́ sílẹ̀.
en: After all the struggles, Akintola wrote and quit his job.

yo: Ọ̀rọ̀ tí wọ́n bá fi lọni là á fèsìí sí, ìdààmú làyọjúràn í kó bá ni
en: The words that are given to him today, he will be immediately troubled if he has

yo: Wọ́n ti lé àwọn ọlọ́kadà àti oníkẹ̀kẹ́ kúrò ní ojú òpópónà ìjọba.
en: They have chased away the peddlers and cyclists from the government roads.

yo: Ọ̀kan nínú àwọn tó fẹ́ figa gbága fún ipò ààrẹ ti sọ pé òun ò ṣe mọ́.
en: One of those who want to compete for the position of president has said that he will not do it anymore.

yo: Ó túbọ̀ rọ àwọn aráàlú láti bá ìjọba mìíràn fọwọ́sowọ́pọ̀
en: He urged the citizens to cooperate with other governments

yo: Ẹ wá wọkọ̀ ojú-irin ọ̀fẹ́ láti Èkó lọ sí Ìbàdàn.
en: Come and ride the free train from Lagos to Ibadan.

yo: È̀èmọ̀ lukutu pẹ́bẹ́! Ìyàwó lóyún tán ọ̀nà ò gbọkọ.
en: What a shame! A pregnant wife is on the way.

yo: Ọkọ̀ ojú irin yìí yóò máa gbéra láti Ìju lọ sí Eko tí yóò si máa balẹ̀ sí ìlú Ìbàdàn.
en: This train will depart from Iju to Lagos and will land in Ibadan.

yo: Adarí fún ètò ìrìnnà Nàìjíríà, Rótìmí sọ̀rọ̀ yìí lásìkò ìfilọ́lẹ̀ ètò ọkọ̀ ojú irin náà.
en: Director of the Nigerian transport system, Rotimi said this at the launch of the train.

yo: Adarí fún ètò ìrìnàjò ní ọkọ̀ ojú irin ọ̀fẹ́ náà yóò parí ní osù kẹta ọdún to kọjá
en: The director for the free train travel program will end in the third month of last year

yo: Oríṣi ọ̀bẹ là á rí lọ́jọ́ ikú erin.
en: A kind of knife was saved on the day of the elephant's death.

yo: Mò ń bọ̀ wá olorun kì í tán lógún ọdún.
en: I am coming to God for not more than 20 years.

yo: Àyọjúràn kìí ṣe ìwà rere fún ọmọlúàbí.
en: Help is not a virtue for a decent person.

yo: Ọ̀jọ̀gbọ́n Ọlájídé ló kéde àbájáde ètò ìdìbò náà lọ́jọ́ Àbámẹ́ta ní ìpínlẹ̀ náà .
en: Professor Olajide announced the results of the election on the third day in the state.

yo: Àyìnlá jáwé olúborí pẹ̀lú àmì ayò ẹ̀rin sí ẹ̀ta.
en: Ainthla left the winner with a sign of joy to the others.

yo: Gbogbo ẹ̀tọ́ àti àṣẹ ìwé yìí jẹ́ ti: ilé-iṣẹ́ Bójúrí ẹnu a dáké.
en: All rights and permissions of this book belong to: Bojuri company.

yo: Bí alẹ́ bá lẹ́, à á fi ọmọ ayò fún ayò.
en: If the night is late, we will give a happy child for joy.

yo: Wọn yóò bẹ̀rẹ̀ ìyanṣẹ́lódì láìpẹ́ kí gbogbo ènìyàn ò ra oúnjẹ sílẹ̀.
en: They will start the mission soon so that everyone does not buy food.

yo: Ààyè kò sí fún ẹnikẹ́ni láti ṣe ẹ̀dà ìwé yìí àfi bí ó bá gba àṣẹ òǹkọ̀wé.
en: No one is allowed to make a copy of this book without the author's permission.

yo: Ọ̀já: alárinà ìyá àti ọmọ, ìwọ to ń gbẹ́kún ọmọ ṣọmọ gẹ̀gẹ̀.
en: Oja: the mediator between mother and child, you are the one who weeps for the child.

yo: Adéwálé ní ìgbésẹ̀ tí ìjọba àpapọ̀ fẹ́ gbé yìí dára púpọ̀.
en: Adéwale said the steps the federal government wants to take are very good.

yo: Apẹ̀rọ̀ níbi ọ̀rọ̀ gbé rọ̀, akígbe ogun ní ibi kólekóle
en: A slanderer at the place of the word hangs down, a war cryer at the place of construction

yo: Ojú oró ní ń lékè omi, ọ̀ṣínbàtà ní ń tẹ́lẹ̀ odò.
en: Summer is going up the water, sandal is following the river.

yo: Àìníṣẹ́ẹ́ṣe ló fà á tí àwọn géńdé ọkùnrin kùnrìn fi ń tayò lọ́sàn-án.
en: It is the lack of work that the men of the village are known for during the day.

yo: Omi ńlá tí ń ya igi ilẹ̀ tí tún ń yagi oko, àlejò ní gbogbo ilẹ̀kílẹ̀.
en: The big water that breaks the trees of the land and also destroys the farm, strangers in every country.

yo: Kò sí irú ìbínú tó yẹ kí ènìyàn ó lè gba ẹ̀mí ọmọlàkejì i rẹ̀.
en: There is no type of anger that a person should be able to take the life of his fellow man.

yo: Ní báyìí ìpànìyàn àti ilé sísun ń lọ lọ́wọ́ ní agbègbè Boje.
en: Now killing and burning houses are going on in Boje area.

yo: Bákan náà, a ò tíì mọ ohun tó fa ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ burúku yìí.
en: Likewise, we still do not know the cause of this tragic event.

yo: Àdó olóró dún ní ilé ìjọsìn nígbà àjọ̀dún!
en: A poisonous drum sounds in the house of worship during the festival!

yo: Ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè e Nàìjíríà gbọ́dọ̀ máa kọ́ bí wọ́n ṣe ń gbé ní ìrẹ́pọ̀ àti àlááfíà.
en: Nigerians must learn how to live in harmony and peace.

yo: Ọmọ orílẹ̀ èdè e Nàìjíríà kò nífẹ̀ẹ́ sí ogun abẹ́lé.
en: Nigerians are not interested in civil war.

yo: Àwọn agbófinró àti ẹ̀ṣọ́ aláàbò ti ń yanjú ìṣòro tó ń kojú ààbò ní díẹ̀ díẹ̀.
en: Law enforcement and security guards have been solving the security problem little by little.

yo: Àjíǹde sọ̀rọ̀ lórí ìpè láti gbé ìgbésẹ̀ bí wọn yóò ṣe lè tètè yanjú u wàhálà náà.
en: Resurrection spoke on the call to take action as soon as possible to solve the problem.

yo: Nàìjíríà bá àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè tí ọ̀fọ̀ ọ́ ṣẹ̀ kẹ́dùn ìjàm̀bá omíyalé.
en: Nigeria sympathizes with the bereaved countries.

yo: Ẹní bá ṣohun ìkọ̀kọ̀, ṣé ó ti gbàgbé adániwáyé tó jókòó lókè?.
en: If someone says something secret, has he forgotten the humanity that sits above?.

yo: Orílẹ̀ èdè Nàìjíríà bá àwọn èèyàn tí ìjàm̀bá omíyalé àti ilẹ̀ ríri ṣẹlẹ̀ sí kẹ́dùn púpọ̀.
en: The nation of Nigeria sympathizes with the people affected by the earthquake and landslide.

yo: A kì í tó ara ẹni í bá rìn ká má tó ọ̀rọ̀ bá ara wa sọ.
en: We are not enough to walk without talking to each other.

yo: Gbogbo ìlú lọ ń jó lọ ń yọ̀ torí àṣeyọrí ìdìbò tó ń bọ̀ lọ́nà.
en: The whole city is dancing and rejoicing because of the success of the upcoming election.

yo: Àdàbà ń pògèdè bí ẹni pé ẹyẹlé ò gbọ́, ẹyẹlé gbọ́ tiri tiri ló ń tiri.
en: The dove is cooing as if the dove is not listening, the dove is cooing.

yo: Ẹ ṣe àtúnṣe sí gbogbo àwọn ilé-ìwòsàn alábọ́dé lórílẹ̀ èdè yìí.
en: Make corrections to all medium-sized hospitals in this country.

yo: Gbogbo aláǹgbá ló danú délẹ̀, èwo la mọ̀ tí inú ń ro?
en: All lizards are confused, who knows what they are thinking?

yo: Ètò ìnáwó lórí àwọn ilé-ìwòsàn alábọ́dé lórílẹ̀ èdè Nàìjíríà.
en: Budgeting of medium-sized hospitals in Nigeria.

yo: Kí wá lèrè tó ń bẹ nínú u kí ènìyàn rorò lárojù?
en: What is it that is in him that makes people feel sad?

yo: Òkúrorò kìí ní ìyàwó àárọ̀ dọjọ́ alẹ́ torí ìwà a wọn.
en: Okuroro doesn't have a wife day or night because of his behavior.

yo: Ilé ìgbìmọ̀ aṣòfin fẹnukò lórí àtúnṣe sí àwọn ohun tí wọ́n sọ nínú ìpàdé.
en: The House of Assembly voted on the amendment to what was said in the meeting.

yo: Túndé ti gba àbá ti Ọláọba wọlé nípa ṣíṣe àtúnṣe sí owó-orí.
en: Túndé has accepted the proposal of Olaba by making an amendment to the tax.

yo: Àǹfààní yìí yóò pèsè àwujọ tó dára fún àwọn tó bá fẹ́ dáṣẹ́ sílẹ̀.
en: This opportunity will provide a good community for those who want to leave.

yo: Èyí ni ìjọba yóò máa lò láti lè pèsè àwọn ohun amáyédẹrùn ni.
en: This is what the government will use to provide basic necessities.

yo: Ó lè jẹ́ Ogbèyẹ̀kú, wọ́n lè jẹ́ Ògúndáwòrì lójú ọpọ́n.
en: It could be Ogbeyaku, they could be Ogundawori on the surface.

yo: Bá ò kú ìṣe ò tán, bẹ́dàá bá sì wà láyé ìrètí ń bẹ.
en: If you don't die the action is not over, and if there is still hope in the world.

yo: Ikú olóyè Akínyẹlé jẹ́ àdánù málegbàgbé fún ẹbí, ará àti ọ̀rẹ́.
en: Chief Akinyelé's death is an unforgettable loss for family, brothers and friends.

yo: Ìyàwó olóyè Akínyẹlé ṣàpèjúwe ọkọ rẹ̀ gẹ́gẹ́ bí olùfọkànsìn.
en: Chief Akinyele's wife described her husband as devout.

yo: Alága àjọ tó ń ṣe àmójútó eré ìdárayá tẹ́lẹ̀ rí ni ó sọ ọ̀rọ̀ náà.
en: The former chairman of the organization that manages the sport made the speech.

yo: Ààrẹ wá gbàdúrà pé kí Ọlọ́run tẹ́ olóògbé náà sí afẹ́fẹ́ ire.
en: The President then prayed that God would rest the deceased in peace.

yo: Nàìjíríà yóò yá owó fún ìdàgbàsókè ohun amáyédẹrun láti ilẹ̀ òkèèrè.
en: Nigeria will borrow money for international development.

yo: Ifá ló ni ilé ayé, Elédùmarè ló lọ̀run.
en: Ifa is the home of the world, Elédumare is the heaven.

yo: Má jẹ́ kí ohunkóhun tàn ọ́ jẹ, o lè ṣoríire nílé ayé tí a wà yìí.
en: Don't let anything deceive you, you can be lucky in this world.

yo: Ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ tó wáyé lánàá gbomi gidi gan.
en: The match that took place yesterday was really good.

yo: Ajagunfẹ̀yìntì Mobọ́lájí di olóògbé.
en: Mobolaji's victory became deceased.

yo: Sanwó-Olú fi ẹ̀dùn ọkàn rẹ̀ hàn lórí ikú olóògbé ajagunfẹ̀yìntì.
en: Sanwó-Olu expressed his grief over the death of the late winner.

yo: Sanwó-Olú ṣàpèjúwe olóògbé gẹ́gẹ́ bí onírẹ̀lẹ̀ òṣìṣẹ́ ológun.
en: Sanwó-Olu described the deceased as a humble soldier.

yo: Olóògbé kó ipa pàtàkì fún ìdàgbàsókè ìlú Èkó àti lórílẹ̀ èdè e Nàìjíríà lápapọ̀.
en: The deceased played an important role in the development of Lagos and Nigeria as a whole.

yo: Láti ọdún náà ni ètò ìdàgbàsókè  ti wà ní ìpínlẹ̀ náà.
en: Since that year there has been a development plan in the state.

yo: Ó ní kí wọ́n jẹ́ kí ìṣèjọba rere tàn yíká ní àgbègbè àti àwùjọ wa.
en: He asked them to let good governance spread around in our area and society.

yo: Olóògbé Mobọ́lájí jẹ́ Ọlọ́run nípè lẹ́yìn àìsàn díẹ̀.
en: The late Mobolaji was called God after a short illness.

yo: Àwọn ọmọ orílẹ̀ èdè e Nàìjíríà ni yóò jẹ̀gbádùn ètò ìlera alábọ́dé.
en: Nigerians will enjoy a mediocre health system.

yo: Lẹ́yìn tí ikọ̀ náà gbo ewúro ìyà sójú ikọ̀ akẹgbẹ́ wọn lánàá.
en: After the ambassador heard the punishment of their fellow ambassador yesterday.

yo: Àjọ tó ń rí sí ètò ìlera ló sọ̀rọ̀ yìí lọ́jọ́ Ìṣẹgun níbi ìpàdé ìgbìmọ̀ ìjọba àpapọ̀.
en: The health care organization said this on Victory Day at the federal government council meeting.

yo: Bí orílẹ̀ èdè Nàìjíríà ṣe ṣe àṣeyọrí lórí ààrùn rọmọ lápá-rọmọ lẹ́sẹ̀.
en: How the nation of Nigeria has succeeded in overcoming the epidemic.

yo: Àjọ ọ̀hún wá ń ṣe bẹ̀bẹ̀ fún ètò ìrànwọ́ ìgbìmọ̀ tó ń rí sí ètò ọrọ̀ ajé láti pèsè owó.
en: The organization then makes a plea for the financial assistance program of the council to provide money.

yo: Ẹ máṣe fààyè gba ìrẹ̀wẹ̀sì ọkàn. Ààrẹ gba àwọn èèyàn níyànjú.
en: Do not allow yourself to be discouraged. The president encouraged the people.

yo: Bùhárí gbóṣúba káre fún ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Nàìjíríà fún iṣẹ takun-takun wọn.
en: Buhari commended the Nigerian footballers for their hard work.

yo: Ààrẹ wá lo ìwà akínkanjú àwọn ọ̀dọ́ náà láti fi gbà wọ́n níyànjú.
en: The president then used the bravery of the youth to encourage them.

yo: Wọ́n tẹ́ Olóògbé tó kú ní ọjọ́ ìsinmi sáfẹ́fẹ́ rere nílùú tí a gbé bí i.
en: The deceased was buried on Sunday in the city where he was born.

yo: Mẹ́rìndínlógún ni àwọn odù tó wà nílée bàba onífá.
en: There are sixteen children in the house of the wise man.

yo: Ó rọ àwon èèyàn láti gbé ìgbéayé ìrọrùn torí àwọn tó wà láyìíká a wọn.
en: He urged people to live a simple life for those around them.

yo: Nínú ọ̀rọ̀ ìdúpẹ́, ọkọ olóògbé náà dúpẹ́ lọ́wọ́ àwọn èèyàn fún ìfẹ́ tí wọ́n fi hàn.
en: In the speech of thanksgiving, the deceased husband thanked the people for the love they showed.

yo: Àwọn tó kópa nínú ìsìnkú náà ni akọ̀wé àgbà a ìjọba àpapọ̀ àti àwọn ará ibi-iṣẹ́ rẹ̀.
en: Those who participated in the funeral were the secretary general of the federal government and members of his office.

yo: Ó tún mọ àwọn èèyàn jàǹkàn-jàǹkàn tó wá síbi ayẹyẹ náà.
en: He also knew a lot of people who came to the party.

yo: Àyà ọmọ náà máa ń tètè já tọrí náà má pariwo mọ́ ọ.
en: The baby's chest is easily broken so do not shout at him.

yo: Oúnjẹ́ amáradàgbà ṣe kókó lára àwọn oúnjẹ tí ọmọ máa ń jẹ́ dàgbà.
en: Healthy food is one of the main foods that children eat when they grow up.

yo: Àwọn mùsùlùmí kìí jẹ ẹlẹ́dẹ̀ wọn ò sì kí ń jẹ ajá.
en: Muslims do not eat pigs and do not eat dogs.

yo: Àwọn ẹlẹ́sìn ìbílè sọ pé Èṣù yàtọ̀ sí S̀àtánì àwọn onígbàgbọ́.
en: Traditional religions say that the Èṣù is different from the believers' Satan.

yo: Ìkíni òjò yàtọ̀ sí ìkíni ìgbà ẹ̀rùn báyìí lọmọ́ ṣorí nínú ẹ̀ya Yorùbá.
en: The rain greeting is different from the summer greeting in the Yoruba culture.

yo: Ìbà ohun gbòòrọ̀ tó doríkodò tí ò ṣomi.
en: A broad, horizontal fever that does not drain.

yo: Ìbà ìyámọ̀pó tó doríkodò tí kò ṣẹ̀jẹ̀.
en: Chronic maternal fever that does not bleed.

yo: Ọjọ́ mẹ́fa ni ọlọ́run fi dá ilé ayé ó sì fi ọjọ́ kejè sinmi.
en: God created the world in six days and rested on the seventh day.

yo: Ṣé àláfíà lọkọ àti ọmọ rẹ wà? O dẹ̀ kú ìtọ́jú u wọn.
en: Are you and your child safe? He took care of them.

yo: Àmọ̀là ló wù mí jẹ ṣùgbọ́n kò sí àbùlà, ewédú nìkan ló wà.
en: I wish I could eat but there is no miracle, there is only charcoal.

yo: Mo fẹ́ lọ wẹ̀ lódò àmọ́ ẹ̀rù ń bà mí nítorí ọ̀ọ̀nì wà lódọ̀ náà.
en: I want to bathe in the river but I am afraid because there is someone near it.

yo: Láàárín gbogbo rògbòdìyàn tó ń lọ nílùú, o tún rántí oúnjẹ.
en: In the middle of all the problems going on in the city, you also remember food.

yo: Mo padà lọ sí ìlú òdì kejì láti lọ ṣe àyèwò ohun tó ń ṣe mí.
en: I went back to the other side of the city to see what was happening to me.

yo: Ọjọ́ burúkú èṣù gbomi mu ni ọjọ́ náà, mo sáré eré lóhun ò rán mi níṣẹ́.
en: It was a bad day for the Èṣù to drink water.

yo: A ti wọ inú oṣù kẹfà èyí tó jẹ́ ìdajì ọdún yìí.
en: We have entered the sixth month which is half of this year.

yo: Ọ̀rẹ́ mi ṣẹ̀ṣẹ̀ ra mọ́tò tuntun ni gbogbo wa ṣe ń dunnú.
en: My friend just bought a new car and we are all excited.

yo: Mò ń ṣiṣẹ́ ajẹ́ lọ́wọ́ ni àfẹ́sọ́nà mí wọlé dé.
en: I was working as a magician when my fiance arrived.

yo: Mo fẹ́ràn ọ̀gá à mi gan-an ni ṣùgbọ́n ó lè da èèyàn láàmú.
en: I really like my boss, but he can be confusing.

yo: Àìgbọ́ràn máa ń kóbá ọmọ ẹlòmíràn ó sàn láti máa gbọ́ràn.
en: Disobedience hurts someone else's child, it is better to listen.

yo: Àìgbọ́dọ̀máṣe ni ìwẹ gbọ́dọ̀ jẹ́ fún gbogbo ẹ̀dá èèyàn.
en: Bathing is a must for all human beings.

yo: Ṣé ìwọ náà máa dìbò lọ́dún yìí, àbí o ò ní dìbò?
en: Will you vote this year, or will you not vote?

yo: Ṣe owó wà lọ́wọ́ ẹ kí ó tó lọ ra ohun tí owó rẹ kò ní ká?.
en: Do you have money in your hand before he goes to buy something that you don't have money for?.

yo: Owólabí, orúkọ á rò ẹ́ níbi gbogbo tó o bá lọ oo.
en: Owolabi, your name will be remembered everywhere you go.

yo: Àdúrà lọ̀páa krístẹ́nì ni Bíbélì mímọ wí, ẹ máa gbàdúrà.
en: Prayer in the Christian way is what the Holy Bible says, pray.

yo: Irú ìwà bẹ́ẹ̀ ò tún gbọ́dọ̀ ṣọmọ lọ́wọ́ ẹ mọ́, ǹjẹ́ o gbọ́ mi?
en: That kind of behavior should not be tolerated by you anymore, do you hear me?

yo: Ata rodo wọ́n lọ́jà ká má tó ṣọ̀rọ̀ nípa tòmáàtì.
en: Peppers are sold in the market before we talk about tomatoes.

yo: Ọmọ bí irú Bídèmí ṣọ̀wọ́n láti fẹ́ ní òde òní.
en: A child like Bidemi is rare to marry nowadays.

yo: Bàbá a bàbá mi jẹ́ èèyàn pàtàkì láwùjọ àwọn olóyè ìlú Ẹ̀gbá.
en: My father's father was an important person in the society of Egba city chiefs.

yo: Ọmọ ọba ní ọ̀rẹ́ mi kò túmọ̀ sí pé ọmọ ọba ni èmi náà.
en: The son of a king is my friend does not mean that I am also the son of a king.

yo: Mo ní bàbá kan tó mọ iyì ọmọ kódà kì í fi mí ṣeré.
en: I have a father who knows the dignity of a child and does not play with me.

yo: Ẹ̀kọ́ ṣe pàtàkì fún ọmọ tí ó bá fẹ́ di èèyàn gíga láwùjọ.
en: Education is important for a child who wants to become a high person in society.

yo: Aṣíwájú ni ẹ máa jẹ́, kìí ṣèrò ẹ̀yìn èyí ni àdúrà àwọn òbí.
en: You will be the first, not thinking behind this is the prayer of the parents.

yo: Ìrìbọmi àti ìfèdèfọ̀  ṣe pàtàkì fún àwọn ọmọ lẹ́yìn.
en: Baptism and baptism are important for children.

yo: Ṣé ẹ rò pé ojú lásán ṣe é ṣe òṣèlú ni? Ojú lásán ò ṣe é.
en: Do you think that he is just a politician? Mere eyes do not do it.

yo: Òṣùpá á máa ràn lásìkò o tirẹ̀, òòrùn a sì máa ràn lásìkò o tirẹ̀.
en: The moon will shine in its time, and the sun will shine in its time.

yo: Àwọn Ọba dà bí òòṣà tí a ò lè fọwọ́ rọ́ sẹ́yìn láwùjọ Yorùbá.
en: Kings are like an untouchable tool in Yoruba society.

yo: Mi ò ní pẹ́ dé ilé mọ́, ọkọ ló takú nígbà tí à ń bọ̀.
en: I won't be home soon, my husband insists on coming home.

yo: Jọ̀ ọ́, fún mi ní ọgbọ̀n ìṣẹ́jú láti fi parí ohun tí mo ń ṣe kí o tó dé.
en: Please, give me thirty minutes to finish what I'm doing before you come.

yo: Ó le jẹ́ kí ó rí nǹkan náà ṣe, ó sì le má rìí bí ó ṣe sọ tẹ́lẹ̀.
en: He may let him see the thing done, and he may not testify as he said before.

yo: Rọra ṣe pẹ̀lú ọ̀rẹ́ mi ó máa ń ṣe ojúkòkòrò ohun tí kì í ṣe tìrẹ.
en: Be gentle with my friend, he always covets what is not his.

yo: Mi ò ní fẹ́ kí o fi ikú ṣèfàjẹ ni mo ṣe gbà ẹ́ nímọ̀ràn.
en: I will not want you to betray death is what I advised you.

yo: Àìgbọ́ràn ló sún un dé ibi tí ó wà yìí torí kì í gbọ́ràn.
en: It is disobedience that drives him to where he is because he does not obey.

yo: Ọ̀lẹ ọpọlọ ló ń ṣe Àbẹ̀kẹ́ torí kò fẹ́ ronú rárá àti rárá.
en: He is mentally lazy because he does not want to think at all.

yo: Ṣé àmójútó ilé tí mo bá ti lọ n ò gbọ́dọ̀ dé kí n bá a kó dọ̀tí.
en: Should the housekeeper not come to pick up the dirt after I leave?

yo: Mo fẹ́ ṣe ìgbọ̀nsẹ̀ ni kòkòrò tá mi léṣe níbi mo bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí.
en: I want to make a toilet is the bug that caused me where I started.

yo: Wọ́n ṣẹ̀ṣẹ̀ dé láti oko ẹ̀gẹ́ ni kódà wọ́n ti ta ìdajì ẹ̀gẹ́ náà.
en: They had just arrived from the trap farm and had even sold half of the trap.

yo: Ó wù mí láti lọ sí ìlú ọba kí èmi náà le ní ipa láyé.
en: I want to go to the royal city so that I too can have an impact in the world.

yo: Kò sí ohun tí mo lè ṣe sí ọ̀rọ̀ yìí afi kí n máa wo àwọn méjèèjì.
en: There is nothing I can do about this matter except to look at both of them.

yo: Ọlọ́pàá ni ó wá gbé e lọ sí àgọ́ ọ wọn ní àárọ̀ yìí lẹ́yìn tí ọwọ́ bà á.
en: The police took him to their camp this morning after he was injured.

yo: Gbogbo wa ni a máa ṣoríire kò sẹ́ni tó gbàdúrà kí a má ṣoríire.
en: We will all be happy, no one prays that we will not be happy.

yo: Inú òkùnkùn ni mo wà nípa ọ̀rọ̀ náà, ẹ jọ̀wọ́ ẹ bá mi tán ìmọ́lẹ̀ síi.
en: I am in the dark about the matter, please enlighten me.

yo: Àwọn ọ̀rẹ́ mi ṣe gudugudu méje yààyà mẹfà níbi ìsìnkú ìyá ìyáà mi.
en: My friends did seven or six funerals at my mother's funeral.

yo: Ìwà rere á máa fi iyì kún iṣẹ́ ènìyàn tẹra mọ́ ìwà rẹ.
en: Good manners will add dignity to people's work, stick to your behavior.

yo: Orun ń kùn mi ni mo ṣe sún sí inú ibùsọ̀ torí atẹ́gùn ń fẹ́ níbẹ̀.
en: I was sleepy so I moved inside the station because the air was blowing there.

yo: Omi ò gbọdọ̀ tán nínú ilé yìí kí o yára lọ pọnmi.
en: The water must not run out in this house so you have to go quickly.

yo: Mo ní ìgbàgbọ́ nínú Ọlọ́run tí mò ń sìn pé ó máa ṣe ohun tí mo gbàdúrà fún.
en: I have faith in the God I serve that he will do what I pray for.

yo: Ó dà bí i pé olórí burúkú ni ẹni yìí torí ó fẹ́ fi tirẹ̀ kó bá mi.
en: It seems that this person is a bad leader because he wants to give his own to me.

yo: Wọ́n ti mú iná dé àmọ́ kò pẹ́ tí wọ́n tún fi mú iná lọ.
en: They had brought the fire but it was not long before they took the fire away.

yo: Ó ti wà ní ilé ìwòsàn láti bí i oṣù kan tí kò sì sí ìyípadà  kankan.
en: She has been in the hospital to give birth for a month and there has been no change.

yo: Kò sí iyọ̀ nínú oúnjẹ yìí, ẹ jọ̀wọ́ ṣe ajàtẹ́ ló ń jẹun ní?
en: There is no salt in this food, please, is the tiger eating it?

yo: Mo máa ràn ẹ́ lọ́wọ́ ṣùgbọ́n o máa fi ara à rẹ sílẹ̀.
en: I will help you but you will leave yourself alone.

yo: Ó jẹ mí lówó tó pọ̀ díẹ̀ kò dẹ̀ tí ì san owó kankan padà.
en: He cost me a lot of money and never paid back.

yo: Aago kan kọjá ogún ìṣẹ́jú ló lù báyìí, ṣé o ti fẹ́ máa lọ ní?
en: It's past twenty minutes now, do you want to go?

yo: Mo fẹ́ sáré lọ ra nǹkan ọbẹ̀ lọ́jà, kò sí nǹkan kan nílé tí ẹ lè jẹ.
en: I want to run to the market to buy soup, there is nothing at home that you can eat.

yo: Ata tí wọ́n lọ̀ ò kúná rárá ìdí tí mo fi dá a padà nìyìí.
en: The pepper that they left was not bad at all, that's why I returned it.

yo: Àsìkò tí ó yẹ kí àwọn olóko gbìn nǹkan rèé.
en: This is the time when farmers should plant their crops.

yo: Ọjọ́ ti lọ ka tó délé aago méjìlá tí kọjá pàápàá.
en: The day went by until it was past 12 o'clock.

yo: Ojo ni ọmọ yìí máa yà bí wọ́n ṣe ń jù ú sókè ni ó ń fà aṣọ wọn.
en: This child will be amazed as they throw him up and pull their clothes.

yo: Màmá máa ń gbàdúrà lọ́sàn-án lóru kí ọmọ lè làlùyọ.
en: Mother prays day and night so that the child can be successful.

yo: Ẹrù èèyàn méjì ti di èèyàn kan ṣoṣo lẹ́yìn tí baálé ilé tí kú.
en: Two people have become one person after the death of the head of the house.

yo: Ọlọ́run ni ọkọ àwọn opó, bàbá àwọn ọmọ òrukàn.
en: God is the husband of widows, the father of orphans.

yo: Ọ̀pọ̀ èèyàn ni wọ́n ń sáré owó lóde òní wọn ò ronú àtubọ̀tán
en: Many people are chasing money today without thinking twice

yo: Ọ̀tọ̀ ni kí ènìyàn ó ní owó, ọ̀tọ̀ ni kí ènìyàn ó máa fi owó tí ó ní fi sàánú.
en: It is different for a person to have money, it is different for a person to spend money that he will spend.

yo: Ọ̀tọ̀ọ̀tọ̀ ni kí wọ́n dá sèríà fún àwọn  ọ̀daràn méjèèjì .
en: They should create a separate series for the two criminals.

yo: Ìyà tó bá tọ́ ni kí wọ́n fi jẹ ẹni tí ọwọ́ pálábá ẹ̀ bá ségi.
en: The right punishment is to be given to the person whose hand is broken.

yo: Mo fẹ́ lọ aṣọ mi kí wọ́n tó mú iná lọ.
en: I want to wash my clothes before they set fire to it.

yo: Mo fẹ́ bá wọn sọ̀rọ̀ àmọ́ kò sí ààyè títí tí ìnáwó náà fi tán.
en: I want to talk to them but there is no opportunity until the money is spent.

yo: Omi dáa lára ṣùgbọ́n má mu omi tí ò bá mọ́.
en: Water is good for you but don't drink unclean water.

yo: Àwọn aṣọ tí mo sá ò gbẹ, òjò tún pa á mọ́ ibi tí mo sá a ṣí.
en: The clothes I ran from did not dry, the rain also covered them where I ran from.

yo: Àyìndé ti padà sá kúrò nílé.
en: The goat has run away from home.

yo: Ó ti ń wùwà líle.
en: He was looking hard.

yo: Ohun tí mo kórìíra jù ni kí èèyàn máa ja olè.
en: What I hate the most is that people fight thieves.

yo: Ọba ni mí ní ààyè mi.
en: I am the king of my place.

yo: Ọ̀la ni wọ́n máa sin bàbá àgbà.
en: Tomorrow they will bury the grandfather.

yo: Ọjọ́ wo ni o máa mú ìyàwó wálé?
en: What day will you bring the bride home?

yo: Ṣé o ti rí iṣẹ́ gidi?
en: Have you found a real job?

yo: Ọlọ́run á fi ọmọ rere jíǹkíi yín.
en: God will reward you with a good son.

yo: Fìlà a yín ò bá aṣọ yín mú
en: Your hat does not match your clothes

yo: Ilé kejì ni ariwo ti pọ̀ tó yìí
en: The noise was so loud in the second house

yo: Mo fẹ́ lọ dáná fún ọkọ mi.
en: I want to cook for my husband.

yo: Mo lọ sí ilé-ìwé àwọn ọmọ ọ̀ mi ní àárọ̀ yìí lórí i bí wọ́n ṣe máa ń nà wọ́n.
en: I went to my children's school this morning about how they used to spank them.

yo: Oúnjẹ ló gbòdì lára rẹ̀
en: It was food that broke him

yo: Egbò ò kín ṣe nǹkan gidi
en: It's superficial and doesn't do anything real

yo: Àìlówó lọ́wọ́, àìsàn kan ni.
en: Lack of money, it is a disease.

yo: Ẹ̀gbọ́n-ọ̀n mi ò ní pẹ́ dé ilé.
en: My brother will not be home soon.

yo: Mo fẹ́ wo ètò kan lórí i amóhùnmáwòrán.
en: I want to watch a program on the television.

yo: Àwọn ọmọ yìí nílò o àmójútó gidi.
en: These children need real care.

yo: Ó fẹ́ tètè lọ sí ibi tí ẹ rán an kó lè tètè dé.
en: He wants to quickly go to the place you sent him so that he can arrive quickly.

yo: Ìròyìn rere kan ló wọlé tọ̀ mí wà
en: A good news came to me

yo: Ẹ má fi iṣẹ́ mi falẹ̀ torí mi ò fẹ́ràn ọ̀lẹ.
en: Do not neglect my work because I do not like to be lazy.

yo: Ẹ má binú pé mo pẹ́ dé sún kẹẹrẹ fàkẹẹrẹ ló pọ̀ lọ́nà.
en: Don't be upset that I arrived late and it was a long way.

yo: Ẹ ṣeun gan-an ni fún àtìlẹ́yìn-in yín.
en: Thank you very much for your support.

yo: Mi ò kí ń ṣe aláìsàn.
en: I don't want to be sick.

yo: Mi ò ní figbá kan bọ̀kan nínú.
en: I will not be beaten.

yo: Àánú kì í ṣe olójúkòkòrò ọmọ torí ó ní ìtẹ́lọ́rùn.
en: Mercy is not a greedy child because it is satisfied.

yo: Àlọ́ méjì ni a ní àlọ́ àpamọ̀ àti àlọ́ àpagbè
en: There are two types of gambling, the bank gambling and the gambling gambling

yo: Ta ni ọba ògo náà?
en: Who is the king of glory?

yo: Láálá tó lọ sókè ilẹ̀ ló ń bọ̀.
en: The dream that went up to the ground is coming.

yo: Ìmọràn náà dára àmọ́ kò ṣe é tẹ̀lé.
en: The advice was good but he did not follow it.

yo: Aṣọ títà ni iṣẹ́ ìyá a Bùkọ́lá.
en: Bukola's mother's job is to sell clothes.

yo: Wọ́n ti hú kùkùté igi náà kúrò lóko.
en: The stump of the tree had been pulled out.

yo: Àjàkálẹ̀ àrùn bẹ́ sílẹ̀ káàkiri àgbáyé.
en: Epidemics broke out all over the world.

yo: Àkísà ò kí ń ṣe ohun à á wọ̀ ròde.
en: Akisa does not know what to wear.

yo: Ọgbọ́n ọlógbọ́n kì ń jẹ́ a pe àgbà ní wèrè.
en: A wise man is not called a fool.

yo: Mo lọ sí ibi tí wọ́n rán mi sí àmọ́ n ò bá wọn ńlé.
en: I went to the place where they sent me but I did not go home with them.

yo: Ìwé-ẹ̀rí kò kí ń ṣe ìwé tí wọ́n fi ń ta gugúrú ní etí ọ̀nà.
en: A certificate is not a book that is sold on the side of the road.

yo: Àárò ìyá àgbà lábúlé ń sọ mi.
en: The grandmother in the village is talking to me.

yo: Ẹ fi àtẹ̀jíṣẹ́ ṣọwọ́ sí wa ní orí ẹ̀rọ ayélujára.
en: Feel free to contact us online.

yo: Ọyún ń yọ ní etí ọmọ náà.
en: The fetus is leaking from the child's ear.

yo: Ìbáṣepọ̀ tó dán mọ́rán wà láàárín-in wọn.
en: There is a good relationship between them.

yo: Aforó yáró kì í jẹ́ kóró ó tán.
en: The fast track is not short at all.

yo: Ẹlẹ́ṣẹ̀ kan kì yóò lọ láì jìyà.
en: A sinner will not go unpunished.

yo: Ó dára kí a yára gbọ́rọ̀ kí a sì lọ́ra láti fèsì.
en: It is better to be quick to listen and slow to respond.

yo: Ènìyàn ò fẹni fọ́rọ̀ àforí ẹni.
en: People don't want to apologize.

yo: A dán mi wò láti lù ú padà, ṣùgbọ́n mo kó ara à mi ní ìjánu.
en: I was tempted to hit him back, but I restrained myself.

yo: Ibi orí dá ni sí là á gbé.
en: The place where the head is born will live.

yo: Awuye-wuye kan wáyé pé Sọjí ló pa ìyàwó o rẹ̀.
en: There was a controversy that Soji killed his wife.

yo: Ẹ̀dá ò lè gbìn àlùbọ́sà kó ká ẹ̀fọ́ láyé láyé.
en: Human beings cannot plant onions and harvest weeds in the world.

yo: Gbà mí nígbà òjò kí n gbà ọ́ nígbà ẹ̀rùn.
en: Save me in the rain and I will save you in the summer.

yo: Àwọn ọ̀dọ́ ní láti bọ̀wọ̀ fún àwọn àgbàlagbà.
en: Young people have to respect the elders.

yo: Má kàn máa wò ṣáá, fọwọ́ sowọ́pọ̀ pẹ̀lú u wa.
en: Don't just look, join us.

yo: A kò gbọdọ̀ jẹ́ kí ìrẹ̀wẹ̀sì ọkàn ó bá wa torí ìwà àwọn èèyàn.
en: We must not be discouraged because of people's behavior.

yo: Ó bẹ Lábísí láti bá a fọwọ́ kún iṣẹ́ náà.
en: He asked Labisi to help him with the work.

yo: Ẹgbẹ́ ìdàgbàsókè ní ọ̀ọ́dúnrún ààayè ní ilé ìgbìmọ̀ aṣòfin.
en: The development group has 300 seats in the parliament.

yo: Àjò ò dà bí ilé, ilé làbọ̀ ìsinmi oko.
en: Travel is not like home, home is like a farm holiday.

yo: Ọkàn mí ṣàfẹ́rí i rẹ olólùfẹ́ ẹ̀ mi.
en: My heart longs for you my love.

yo: Ẹṣin iwájú ni tẹ̀yìn ń wò sáré.
en: The horse in front is looking forward.

yo: Adébíyìí jẹ́ elégbèlẹ́yìn ẹgbẹ́ ẹ wa.
en: Adébiyi is the backbone of our group.

yo: Bàbá mi gbà láti fi ọwọ́ kún iṣẹ́ náà láì ka iye owó tí yóò ná a.
en: My father agreed to contribute to the project regardless of the cost.

yo: Ká fọwọ́wẹwọ́ lọwọ́ fi ń mọ́.
en: Let's shake hands with him.

yo: Ọmọ náà fúyẹ́ torí kì í jẹun.
en: The child is weak because he does not eat.

yo: Bọ́mọdé bá mọ ọwọ́ wẹ̀, yóò bá àgbà jẹun.
en: If a child knows how to wash his hands, he will eat with the elders.

yo: Iná èsìsì kì í jóni lẹ́ẹ̀mejì.
en: The fire never burns twice.

yo: Kí ó má ba à ṣẹ̀wọ̀n, ó bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí í sáré síhìn-ín sọ́hùn-ún.
en: In order not to catch him, he started running here and there.

yo: Bálẹ́ yó ti rí, òwúrọ̀ là á ti í mọ̀.
en: You know, it's morning.

yo: Irú ìgbé-ayé báyìí kò mọ́ mi lára rárárárá.
en: This kind of life is not familiar to me at all.

yo: Àkọ́dá oró kò dà bí àdágbẹ̀yìn.
en: A sick person is not like a leper.

yo: Bó bá kọjú sí ẹ o tá, bó bá kẹ̀yìn sí ẹ o ta á.
en: If he faces you, he will shoot him, if he turns away from you, he will shoot him.

yo: Kí gbogbo mùtúmùwà gbáradì láti jẹ́ kí ìṣòkan wà láàárín wa.
en: Let everyone prepare to make unity among us.

yo: Ẹ̀dá àgbààyanu rè é o!
en: What a wonderful creature!

yo: Jẹ́nráyégbé sọ pé kí á má fi ọkàn sí ìlérí àwọn olóṣèlú.
en: Genráyégbé ​​said that we should not pay attention to the promises of politicians.

yo: O kò lè dí mi lọ́nà, mo gbọ́dọ̀ wí tèmi.
en: You can't stop me, I have to say mine.

yo: Nínú gbogbo ẹyẹ ọ̀kín lọba ẹyẹ.
en: Of all the birds, the bird is the bird.

yo: Egbin jẹ́ ẹranko kan tí ó rẹwà tí ó sì yàtọ̀ torí àwọ ara rẹ̀.
en: Egbin is an animal that is beautiful and unique because of its skin color.

yo: Ìyà ni wúrà, baba ni dígí.
en: Mother is gold, father is mirror.

yo: Wọ́n pàrokò sí ẹbí ìyàwó lẹ́yìn alẹ́ ìbálé.
en: They are secretly married to the bride's family after the wedding night.

yo: Ọgbọ́n, ìmọ̀ àti òye sodo sínúu ède Yorùbá.
en: Wisdom, knowledge and understanding are inherent in the Yoruba language.

yo: Ẹyín ọmọ náà ti dípẹtà torí kì í rorín.
en: The child's teeth are broken because he does not laugh.

yo: Ìlẹ̀kẹ̀ iyebíye ni ìlẹ̀kẹ̀ iyùn náà jẹ́ bí ó tilẹ̀ jẹ́ pé ó rẹwà.
en: The pearl is a precious pearl even though it is beautiful.

yo: Ògbufọ̀ ewì náà gba ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ ọ sùúrù, ìfarabalẹ̀ àti ọpọlọ.
en: Writing the poem takes a lot of patience, attention and brains.

yo: Oríṣiríṣìí ẹ̀yà ló wà ní orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà.
en: There are different ethnic groups in Nigeria.

yo: Àyálò ọ̀rọ̀ máa ń jẹ́ kí àká ọ̀rọ̀ kún dáadáa.
en: A word of mouth makes the word well filled.

yo: Ẹ jẹ ṣẹ́kù nítorí ọ̀dá, ìgbà kan ò lọ bí òréré.
en: You eat leftovers because of tada, once it doesn't go away like a lucky person.

yo: Òjò ó rọ̀, ó fẹ́rẹ̀ wú òkú ọ̀le
en: It rained, it almost blew the corpse of a thief

yo: Bí kò bá nídìí, ẹ̀ṣẹ́ kì í déédé ṣẹ́
en: If there is no reason, sin will not be committed

yo: Ṣe bí o ti mọ ẹlẹ́wàa ṣàpọ́n.
en: Do as you know how beautiful you are.

yo: Iyán funfun lẹ́lẹ́ arọ̀mádélé ọ̀lẹ.
en: White fever on the lazy day.

yo: Láfún ni ọ̀pọ̀ ń pè ní èlùbọ́ funfun ní apá Ẹ̀gbá.
en: That's why many people call it the white spot in Egba.

yo: Lálónpé dìde ní ìpàdé ó fẹ́ lọ jẹun ńlé.
en: When he got up from the meeting, he wanted to go eat at home.

yo: Àdéhùn tó wà láàárín àwọn méjéèjì ni pé wọn ò ní dalẹ̀.
en: The agreement between the two is that they will not be strong.

yo: Túndé ṣẹ̀ṣẹ̀ lọ ra bàtà tí yóò fi gbéyàwó ní àná òde yìí.
en: Tunde just went to buy the shoes that she will use to get married the day before yesterday.

yo: Ewúre jẹ́ ẹran ile, ó máa ń jìyà púpọ̀.
en: Goat is a domestic animal, it suffers a lot.

yo: Ó ṣe etí bí eti ehoro.
en: He made ears like the ears of a rabbit.

yo: Lọ kó àwọn adìrẹ yẹn sí inú kùkú.
en: Go and put those flags in the grave.

yo: Oorun èkúté ni ọmọ náà sùn.
en: The child slept on the beach.

yo: Ṣọlá lọ ra ègbo àti ẹ̀wà àmọ́ kò rí ní àdúgbò tó wà.
en: Shola went to buy herbs and spices but did not find them in the area.

yo: Kátówí kátófọ̀ ológbò ti kẹ́ja jẹ tán kódà ẹ̀ẹ́rún eegun ni wọ́n rí.
en: They found the fifth cat's body with a thousand bones.

yo: Kò sí owó lọ́wọ́ ọ̀ mi inú mi kàn ń dùn ni.
en: I don't have any money, I'm just happy.

yo: Aìkú ni ọjọ́ àkọ́kọ́ nínú ọ̀sẹ̀.
en: Immortality is the first day of the week.

yo: Wọ́n ní ká gbàdúrà fún àwọn aláìsàn.
en: They asked us to pray for the sick.

yo: Ìjà ńlá bẹ́ sílẹ̀ ní ilẹ̀ Yorùbá, wọ́n pa ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn ẹlẹ́sìn kìrìtẹ́nì.
en: A big fight broke out in Yoruba land, many Christians were killed.

yo: Wọ́n ta ẹran fún ìyá a Ṣadé olóúnjẹ.
en: They sold meat to the nurse Şade's mother.

yo: Ẹkún ìyàwó ṣe pàtàkì ní ọjọ́ ìgbeyàwó.
en: The bride's cry is important on the wedding day.

yo: Iṣẹ́ tí mo fẹ́ ṣe ṣì ku méjì.
en: There are still two jobs I want to do.

yo: Baálẹ̀ ọkọ ìlú kú ní àná.
en: The mayor died yesterday.

yo: Ọmọ tá a bí tá ò kọ́ adójútini ni wọ́n ń pe irú u wọn.
en: A child born without proper education is called their kind.

yo: Mo sun oorun wákàtí mẹ́rin ní ọ̀sán.
en: I slept four hours in the afternoon.

yo: Ó fẹ́ rẹ Àbẹ̀kẹ́ díẹ̀ tori ńà ni mo ṣe dúró tì í.
en: He wanted you to beg a little because that's why I stood by him.

yo: Ṣẹ́gun ṣe ìgbéyàwó ní àná.
en: She got married yesterday.

yo: Mi ò fi bẹ́ẹ̀ fẹ́ràn ẹ̀wà àfi bí mo bá fi nǹkan jẹ ẹ́.
en: I don't really like beauty unless I eat it.

yo: Táájù ń wọ́sẹ̀ ńlẹ̀ bí olóyún.
en: Taaju is walking like a pregnant woman.

yo: Oúnjẹ́ tí a sè dùn gidi gan.
en: The food we cooked was really delicious.

yo: Èèlò dun oúnjẹ náà gbogbo ojú rẹ̀ ló fani mọ́ra.
en: The taste of the food was attractive to all eyes.

yo: Bá mi mú ẹlẹ́rìndòdò kọ̀ọ̀kan wá fún àwọn àlejò.
en: I brought each of them with me for the guests.

yo: Sadé lọ sí ilé onírun ó sì di irun ṣẹ̀kẹ̀rẹ̀ Aláàfin.
en: He went to the barber's house and got Aláfin's hair cut.

yo: Ṣẹ̀kẹ̀rẹ̀ kì í bá wọn ròde ìbànújẹ́.
en: He will never be sad with them.

yo: Kábíyèsí Aláàfin òjò pa ṣẹ̀kẹ̀rẹ̀ ọmọ Àtìbà.
en: The rain killed the son of Atiba.

yo: Ọba ni aláṣẹ ìkejì àwọn òòṣà.
en: The king is the second authority of the craftsmen.

yo: Adìẹ ìrànà náà tóbi dáadáa ìyẹ́ ẹ rẹ̀ náà sì funfun bí ẹ̀gbọ̀n òwú.
en: The chicken was big and its feathers were as white as cotton.

yo: Ìbeji ni ìyá mi bí tẹ̀lé mi àmọ ọ̀kan ṣaláìsí.
en: My mother gave birth to twins after me but one was missing.

yo: Kò sí èèyàn kankan mọ́.
en: There was no one left.

yo: Mo ní ìbéèrè kan fún ọ, ìbéèrè náà rè é.
en: I have a question for you, the question is yours.

yo: Ẹran ẹlẹ́dẹ̀ ni wọ́n pa àmọ wọn ò gbe fún àwọn mùsùlùmí.
en: Pig meat was slaughtered but not given to the Muslims.

yo: Ìgbéyàwó ẹrindun kì í ṣe túláàsì nǹkan ẹwù ni.
en: A happy marriage is not about clothes.

yo: Baálẹ̀ jẹ ọba ìlú u wa.
en: The governor is the king of our town.

yo: Kí ni orúkọ ọ̀ rẹ?
en: What is your name?

yo: Ìfẹ́ tí Àjàlá ní sí Kíkẹ́ ìfẹ́ ẹlẹ́yẹlé ni.
en: Ajala's love for Kike is the love of a dove.

yo: Ta ni ó rán wa níṣẹ́?
en: Who sent us?

yo: Mo ṣe ìlérí fún ọlọ́run láti jẹ́ olóòótọ́.
en: I promised God to be faithful.

yo: Iṣẹ́ ọmọọ̀dọ̀ ni Aríre ń ṣe ní ìlú Èkó.
en: Arire is doing the work of a youth in the city of Eko.

yo: Ìwọ ọmọ odidi onílé ọ̀lọ́nà lò ń ṣe gbála gbàla kiri.
en: You are a wise man, you are making a fool of yourself.

yo: Mi ò sí nílé, ọjà ni mo wà.
en: I'm not at home, I'm at the market.

yo: Ṣé ẹran ti jiná àbí ó ò tí ì gbé e kaná?
en: Is the animal far away or has it not been carried?

yo: Eerin jogún ọlá ni wọ́n kì wọ́n nílé e wọn.
en: Eerin inherits honor and they don't leave their homes.

yo: Ìjà á bẹ́ sílẹ̀ láàárín lọ́kọ láya.
en: A fight will break out between them.

yo: Kò sí wàhálà mọ́, wọ́n ti parí i gbogbo ìjà ààrin wọn.
en: There is no more trouble, they have finished all their fights.

yo: Mọrèmi ò kí ń gbọ́ ìlù sétí torí ó fẹ́ràn ijó.
en: Moremi does not listen to the drums because she likes to dance.

yo: Ó na ọmọ náà ìdí ẹ̀ gbóná.
en: He scolded the child because he was hot.

yo: Wọ́n gbé àwọn màlúù lọ sí ilé ẹjọ́ leyin ti wọ́n jẹ gbogbo irè oko olóko
en: The cows were taken to court after eating all the crops

yo: Mo fẹ́ràn kí n máa jẹun gidi.
en: I like to eat real food.

yo: Ẹja yíyan ni mò ń tà, kódà ohun ni a ń jẹ ní ilé e wa.
en: I sell grilled fish, even what we eat in our house.

yo: Ata náà ti fẹ́ jiná tó bá ṣe díẹ̀ da ẹran yẹn sínú ẹ̀.
en: The chili is about to cook so add the meat in it.

yo: Ta leṣiṣin ò bá gbè tí ò bá ṣe elégbò ọwọ́ ara yín.
en: Who cares if you don't take care of each other.

yo: Alùwàlá ológbò ọgbọ́n àti kẹ́ran jẹ ni.
en: He is a wise and intelligent cat breeder.

yo: Èkuru ń wù mí jẹ àmọ́ wọn ò kí ń ṣe é ní àdúgbò tí mo wà yìí.
en: I like dust but they don't do it in my area.

yo: Ìyá àgbà tó ń tà ẹran ní àdúgbò mi ti kú.
en: The grandmother who sold meat in my community has died.

yo: Iṣẹ́ alágbe ni bàbá a Tìmẹ́yìn ń ṣe.
en: The father of Timei'in was a beggar.

yo: Orúkọ àbísọ yàtọ̀ sí orúkọ àmútọ̀runwá.
en: A nickname is different from a divine name.

yo: Ọbẹ̀ ẹ̀fọ́ àti iyán ni mo sè fún olówó orí ì mi.
en: I cooked a soup of herbs and spices for my rich man.

yo: Aṣèyìí ó wù ú lọlọ́run, dákún má ṣe búburú fáwa.
en: This is what God wants, don't cry and don't do bad things.

yo: Ǹjẹ́ a rí ẹni tí ò faramọ́ àbá yìí kí á tó parí ìpàdé e tòní
en: Can we find someone who does not agree with this proposal before we finish today's meeting

yo: Iṣu lásìn-ín rín dára fún iyán.
en: It is good for fever.

yo: Iṣu ewùrà ni wọ́n fi ń ṣe ọ̀jọ̀jọ̀.
en: They use it to make the day.

yo: Owó wà ní ìdí òwo kòkó.
en: There is money for the main reason.

yo: Omi náà dọ̀tí lójú ṣùgbọ́n omi tó mọ́ ni.
en: The water was dirty but it was clean water.

yo: Odò ìyá aláró ò jìnà sí odò ìyàké.
en: The river of the sick mother is not far from the river of yakke.

yo: Iṣu dára fún ohunkóhun.
en: Yam is good for anything.

yo: Ìfẹ́ ọlọ́run tóbi gidi gan
en: God's love is really great

yo: Ta ni o ṣẹ̀ tí ò dáríjì ọ́?
en: Who did you sin that did not forgive you?

yo: Kí ló ṣẹlẹ̀ ní ibi ìpàdé tí ẹ lọ látàárọ̀?
en: What happened at the meeting place you went to this morning?

yo: Ọmọ bíbí jẹ́ nǹkan iyì fún obìnrin tó wà nílé ọkọ.
en: Having a child is a matter of honor for a woman in her husband's house.

yo: Mo ṣe ayẹyẹ ọjọ́ ìbí mi ní ọ̀sẹ̀ tó kọja lọ.
en: I celebrated my birthday last week.

yo: Báwo ni ẹ ṣe ń ta ọjà a yín?
en: How do you sell your products?

yo: Àwọn ará Asà ò ní ọrọ̀ ajé lára.
en: The people of Asa have no wealth.

yo: Gbogbo èso ni mo fẹ́ràn àfi ìbẹ́pẹ.
en: I like all fruits except papaya.

yo: Ìpàdé wà ní ilé olórí.
en: The meeting was at the chief's house.

yo: Ìdílé Àyàn ló ti jáde wá.
en: It was the Ayan family that came out.

yo: Ọ̀pátọ́lá lorúkọ bàbá tó bí bàbá mi lọ́mọ.
en: Opatola is the name of the father who gave birth to my father.

yo: Àpò ìrẹsì ń wọ́n síi ni lójoojúmọ́.
en: The bag of rice is being washed every day.

yo: Bísí àti Tọ́lá ń jà sí ọkùnrin kan náà.
en: Bisi and Tola are fighting the same man.

yo: Olórí ẹbí ló ṣàdúrà fọ́mọ pẹ̀lú oyin, ìrèké, àádùn, omi, ataare àti ẹja.
en: The head of the family prays with honey, sugar cane, sweets, water, ginger and fish.

yo: Iṣẹ́ ti bẹ̀rẹ̀, èní lọjọ́ ajé kí gbogbo yín yé pá ràdàràdà kiri lẹ́nu iṣẹ́.
en: Work has started, this is the business day so that you can all go straight to work.

yo: Mo ti  jáde ilé ẹ̀kọ́ gíga lẹ́yìn ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ ìdaṣẹ́sílẹ̀ torí ìjọba ò sàn owó.
en: I graduated from high school after many strikes because the government did not pay.

yo: Àyọ̀ká ti gba ìyọ̀ǹda lẹ́nu iṣẹ́, ó kú kí òun náà máa kọ́ àwọn ọmọ ní ohun tó mọ̀.
en: Ayka has given up her job, she wants to teach the children what she knows.

yo: Ìyá à mi mọ ìkẹ́ ọkọ ọ́ ṣe kódà irú obìnrin tó lè ṣe bẹ́ẹ̀ ṣọ̀wọ́n nílé ọkọ.
en: My mother knows what her husband does and even the kind of woman who can do that is rare in her husband's house.

yo: Wọ́n kí Àbẹ̀bí kú ewu ìbejì làǹtì lanti lẹ́yìn tí ó ti bí àbíkú méjì.
en: Abebi died after giving birth to two stillborn babies.

yo: Kí èèyàn máa ṣọ́ra ọ̀rọ̀ tó máa sọ to bá ń bínú torí ẹyin lohùn
en: People should be careful what they say when they are angry because of you

yo: Lówe lówe là ń lùlù àgídìgbo, ọlọgbọ́n ní í jó o ọmọ̀ràn ní í mọ̀ ọ́.
en: Lowe lowe we are hitting adigogo, a wise man is a good man, a friend is a friend who knows him.

yo: Àbọ̀ ọ̀rọ̀ là á sọ fún ọmọlúàbí, bó bá dénú ẹ̀ á dodidi.
en: We will say half a word to the child, if he is upset, he will be warm.

yo: Ọmọ ìyá a máa dá ara wọn áḿbèlètàsé ọ̀rẹ́ tímọ́tímọ́
en: Mother's son will make each other close friends

yo: Òrìṣà bí ọ̀nà ọ̀fun ò sí ojoojúmọ́ ní ń gbẹbọ.
en: A god like a throat is not available every day.

yo: Ẹni tí a forí i rẹ̀ fágbọn kì í jẹ nínú ẹ̀.
en: The one who is forsaken is not one of you.

yo: Ẹní yó ń pá inú, ẹni ebi ń pa ń ran ikùn.
en: A person will be hungry, a person who is hungry will be sick.

yo: Ẹnìkan ò lè rí èèyàn gbédè.
en: One cannot find a free person.

yo: Ibi ayẹyẹ ìṣílé ni mo ti pàdé ọkọ tí mo fẹ́.
en: I met my husband at the housewarming party.

yo: Ìyà ń jẹṣin, ẹ ló ń jó, kẹ́sẹ́ ń gun nímú, ìjánu ń jẹ ẹ́ láhọ́n.
en: The horse is tired, you are the one dancing, the foot is growing in the nose, the bridle is biting you.

yo: Iná jó ilé aṣẹ́wó kan.
en: A fire burned down a brothel.

yo: Ó sáré jáde ní balùwẹ̀ níhòhò.
en: He ran out of the bathroom naked.

yo: Wọ́n dìtẹ̀ mọ́ ọba ṣùgbọ́n Ọlọ́hun ò jẹ́.
en: They conspired against the king but not against God.

yo: Wọ́n fẹ́ fà mí láhọ́n kí n tu kẹ̀lẹ̀m̀bè jáde.
en: They want to force me to release the music.

yo: Wọ́n ń gbàdúrà ìṣubú mi ṣùgbọ́n èèdùà ò gbà fún wọn.
en: They are praying for my downfall, but God does not allow them.

yo: Gììrì ń da ọmọ náà láàmú.
en: The child is troubled by the fever.

yo: Wọn kò mú ìlérí i wọn ṣe.
en: They did not keep their promises.

yo: Wàhálà náà pọ̀ gan-an débi pé ó yọrí sí ogun.
en: The stress was so great that it led to war.

yo: Lẹ́yìn ọ̀sẹ̀ mẹ́fà, ọkọ̀ náà daṣẹ́ sílẹ̀ pátápátá.
en: After six weeks, the ship broke down completely.

yo: Ọ̀fọ̀ ò ní wọlé tọ̀ wá.
en: Mourning will not enter us.

yo: Àdánù ó kéré, ó tóbi ọlọ́run ò ní jẹ́ á kò ó.
en: The loss is small, it is big, God will not eat it.

yo: Ǹjẹ́ èyí ba ayọ̀ wọn jẹ́?
en: Does this spoil their happiness?

yo: Èyí ba àjọṣe tí wọ́n ní pẹ̀lú ẹlẹ́dàá wọn jẹ́.
en: This destroys the relationship they have with their creator.

yo: Onísùúrù ní í fún wàrà a kìnìún.
en: He has the patience to give milk to a lion.

yo: Àbẹ̀tẹ́lẹ̀ ẹ rẹ̀ ń hàn lábẹ́ aṣọ.
en: His butt is showing under his clothes.

yo: Ìgbà tí mo kígbe pè ọ́.
en: That's when I called you.

yo: Ọmọ àgbàdo ni ó ya wálé láti oko.
en: The son of corn came home from the farm.

yo: Ọ̀rọ̀ tí mò ń sọ yìí ti lé ní ọ̀rọ̀ ọdún kan o.
en: What I am saying is more than a year old.

yo: Òtá ò bá yọ̀ mí, ọlọ́run ni ò jẹ́.
en: If the enemy does not please me, God is not.

yo: Ṣèyí ṣiṣẹ, ó kọjá àfẹnusọ.
en: This works, it's beyond words.

yo: A rìn gbẹ̀rẹ̀ gbẹ̀rẹ̀ bí ẹni ẹ̀gbẹ́ ń dùn.
en: We walked tiredly as if the neighbor was happy.

yo: Mo lọ sí Òmù àrán láti lọ kí ọ̀rẹ mi.
en: I went to Omu aran to greet my friend.

yo: Ayọ̀ ń rò mí lẹ́jọ́.
en: Joy is judging me.

yo: Ibà fẹ́ ṣe ọmọ náà.
en: The child wants to be sick.

yo: Wọ́n ní pé ọ̀rọ̀ mi ò gbẹbọ kò gbètùtù.
en: They say that my words do not make amends.
